backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, test attempts, course progress, streaks, badges, news caching, and authorization-protected actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme tokens and applying background/foreground variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, mounting the React app, and bootstrapping main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, query client, daily reminder banner, and all route definitions.
frontend/src/components/course/Clickable: Component showing lesson text that lets users select text to save words or request sentence explanations.
frontend/src/components/course/MyDiction: Displays the user's word bank with loading, error, empty, and authenticated states, and allows removing saved words.
frontend/src/components/course/StoryMode: Renders a card showing a topic's story-mode content including a short story, real-life example, and usage guidance.
frontend/src/components/course/TeacherAI: Provides a floating AI teacher chat panel where users submit sentences and receive local explanations.
frontend/src/components/course/WordSaveD: Modal dialog for saving a word and its meaning to the user's word bank with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/friendChat/ChatG: Shows an alert about the built‑in on-device chat assistant, with enhanced messaging when Power Mode is active.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsFallbac: Lets users enter, store, validate, and open a fallback news URL inside an in-app iframe when regional news is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsItemRow: Displays a news item with TTS playback controls for reading the headline and preview aloud.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPasteLi: Allows users to paste, validate, store, and open a news URL in an in-app browser with error handling and clearing options.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSection: Displays region-specific news with loading, error, empty, and list states.
frontend/src/components/news/TopUSHeadli: Fetches and displays top US headlines with parsing, error handling, and loading UI.
frontend/src/components/progress/BadgeGa: Shows user badge milestones with login, loading, error, and earned badge states.
frontend/src/components/progress/DailySt: Displays the user's daily streak with login, loading, error, and success states.
frontend/src/components/progress/Mistake: Shows learned items and areas to improve, with loading and empty states handled.
frontend/src/components/proInterviewer/B: Renders a floating microphone toggle button with active and inactive visual states.
frontend/src/components/test/ResultEffec: Renders animated confetti on a fullscreen canvas when enabled.
frontend/src/config/newsDataSource.ts: Configures whether news uses demo data or backend sources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiMode.ts: Handles whether AI mode should be used based on local settings and provider connection status, tracking errors and attempt state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourseProgress.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profile, course progress, day counts, and test scores through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyReminder.ts: Manages daily reminder settings, notification permissions, scheduling, and in-app fallback reminders using local settings and progress data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context for authentication, loading stored identities, handling login and logout, and exposing related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterviewReports.t: Fetches and mutates interview analysis reports via backend actor and invalidates queries on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSettings.ts: Loads, updates, and stores local app settings such as API keys, provider enable flags, and reminder preferences, also computing provider status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMistakeTracker.ts: Loads and saves local mistake-tracking data, exposing learned and to-improve lists with update ability.
frontend/src/hooks/usePowerMode.ts: Manages a locally stored OpenAI API key for Power Mode, validating key format and determining mode activation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides region news queries and refresh mutations, supporting demo mode and interacting with backend news methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionNews.ts: Fetches and parses region news with demo mode support, tracks last updated timestamps, and provides a refetch-all mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Provides a local Web Speech API hook for starting, stopping, and handling speech recognition events with transcript and error callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreakBadges.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating user streaks and badges through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSNews.ts: Hooks to fetch and refresh US news content from the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWordBank.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving, saving, and removing user word bank entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, typography, glassmorphism, neon effects, and badge gradients.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1LessonConten: Exports structured day 1 lesson content including grammar explanations and vocabulary words with story-based examples.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1TestQuestion: Defines multiple-choice test questions for day 1 focused on correct use of is/am/are.
frontend/src/lib/course/dayWiseTestGener: Generates Day 1 grammar and vocabulary multiple‑choice test questions based on lesson content. Defines the TestQuestion type and outputs an array of structured questions.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayGrammarChec: Checks each essay line using detectAndCorrect and returns counts and formatted corrections. Skips empty lines and summarizes whether errors exist.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayPowerModeFe: Produces enhanced grammar corrections and writing suggestions for essays, including structure hints and a 10‑point score. Uses detectAndCorrect and additional heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayScoring.ts: Scores an essay from 0–20 using heuristics for length, sentences, capitalization, punctuation, and vocabulary. Returns score plus brief feedback summary.
frontend/src/lib/course/types.ts: Defines shared types for lessons, story mode subsections, topics, and vocabulary words. Provides reusable interfaces across course modules.
frontend/src/lib/friendChat/types.ts: Defines the ChatMessage structure with id, role, text, timestamps, and optional metadata. Supports tutor/user chat messages with optional corrections.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/analyzeUser: Analyzes user text for grammar, tone, vocabulary, keywords, and power‑answer suggestions. Combines detectAndCorrect with custom tone and vocabulary heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/detectAndCo: Applies a set of regex‑based grammar rules to detect and auto‑correct common mistakes. Returns corrected text or null if no errors found.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generatePow: Generates detailed Power Mode tutor replies with safety checks, language detection, greetings, and context‑aware responses. Enhances replies with optional analysis and persona logic.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generateTut: Generates AI tutor replies based on safety checks, language detection, personas, greetings, and context-aware strategies.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/languageDet: Detects Hindi/Hinglish via script and pattern checks and returns predefined mixed-language responses.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/persona.ts: Defines core identity and tone/style settings for friend, teacher, and AI personas and returns persona-specific descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/powerAnswer: Detects simple phrases in user text and suggests stronger vocabulary alternatives.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/progressRep: Accumulates session facts like grammar fixes and vocabulary tips and generates a formatted progress report.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/replyStrate: Analyzes message context (questions, length, topic) and generates mode-specific prompts or follow‑ups.
frontend/src/lib/news/demoNewsData.ts: Provides static demo news items for multiple regions for testing and development.
frontend/src/lib/news/fallbackNewsUrlSto: Stores, retrieves, and clears fallback news URLs in localStorage with prefixed keys.
frontend/src/lib/news/parseNews.ts: Parses GNews API JSON, handling errors and extracting up to 10 cleaned news items with headlines and previews.
frontend/src/lib/news/pasteLinkStorage.t: Stores, retrieves, and clears a pasted news URL in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/news/regionConfig.ts: Defines region metadata including IDs, names, and flag emojis.
frontend/src/lib/news/validateHttpUrl.ts: Validates and normalizes HTTP/HTTPS URLs, returning errors for invalid formats.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/powerModeStor: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing a local-only OpenAI API key in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/validateOpenA: Validates that non-empty OpenAI API keys start with 'sk-'.
frontend/src/lib/progress/mistakeTracker: Provides localStorage read/write helpers for storing and retrieving mistake tracker lists.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/coachAns: Generates coaching feedback including grammar correction, pronunciation analysis, and tailored pro tips based on question category.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/document: Defines interfaces for uploaded documents, extraction results, interview questions, feedback, metrics, and utilities like file size formatting.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/extractT: Returns a failure message for image OCR since no OCR library is available.
Attempts basic text extraction from PDFs using FileReader and returns fallback messages on failure.
Computes answer metrics such as filler count, sentence stats, and derives aggregated interview metrics.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/question: Generates interview questions based on extracted document data, manual notes, and mode-specific logic like DAF questions.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/sessionR: Builds a session report with scoring, body‑language inference, logical consistency, and improvement areas.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/summariz: Parses text to extract keywords, skills, education, roles, and achievement indicators using simple pattern matching.
frontend/src/lib/reminders/dailyReminder: Implements daily reminder logic using Notifications API with fallback checks and localStorage tracking.
frontend/src/lib/security/blockOpenAIReq: Installs runtime guards to block fetch and XHR requests to OpenAI-related domains.
frontend/src/lib/security/noOpenAIPolicy: Defines the policy prohibiting OpenAI/ChatGPT integration and lists allowed alternatives.
frontend/src/lib/settings/localSettingsS: Handles reading, writing, and clearing local-only settings such as API keys and toggles.
frontend/src/lib/settings/providerStatus: Determines provider connection status based on enable flags and API key format validation.
frontend/src/lib/settings/validateKeys.t: Performs lightweight format validation checks for OpenAI and Gemini API keys.
frontend/src/lib/teacherAI/explainSenten: Generates rule-based grammar and vocabulary explanations entirely on-device.
frontend/src/lib/tts/speakText.ts: Provides text‑to‑speech playback with voice selection and error handling using the SpeechSynthesis API.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoonPage.tsx: Renders a Coming Soon UI page with navigation back to the home screen.
frontend/src/pages/Day1LearningHubPage.t: Renders Day 1 lesson hub with dictionary, grammar story mode, clickable text, and AI teacher explanations.
frontend/src/pages/Day1TestPage.tsx: Provides Day 1 test with MCQs and an essay, scoring logic, and result effects with pass/fail feedback.
frontend/src/pages/FriendChatPage.tsx: Implements an AI friend chat with text/voice input, grammar correction, message analysis, and offline tutor replies.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays main navigation grid linking to news, chat, course, tests, progress, and interview modules.
frontend/src/pages/MyProgressPage.tsx: Shows user progress including completed/unlocked days, streaks, badges, and interview report data.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays regional news sections with TTS, refresh support, demo mode notice, and link-paste reader.
Implements a multi‑step AI interview flow with file upload, text extraction, question generation, speech input, coaching, metrics, and session report saving.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for configuring API keys, model settings, and daily reminder notifications stored locally in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Describes project state, planned features, and issues focused on improving an English-learning AI assistant’s behavior and context awareness.
